summary: The Veterans First Act of 2025 (H.R. 2083) aims to redirect $2,000,000,000 from the United States Agency for International Development to the Department of Veterans Affairs. This funding is specifically earmarked for grants to states, supporting the acquisition, construction, remodeling, and modification of state nursing homes, domiciliary facilities, and other care facilities for veterans. The bill references Title 38 of the United States Code, covering veteran care.
